message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product that I think you'll love. I'm asking for $175 for it.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  $175 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only able to offer $100 for it right now.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. $100 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $150 for the product. This is my final offer, as I have another buyer willing to pay $150.
